akn:content.akn:p: (c) Application of prior law in certain cases The phrase “(other than punitive damages)” shall not apply to punitive damages awarded in a civil action— This subsection shall cease to apply to any civil action filed on or after the first date on which the applicable State law ceases to provide (or is no longer construed to provide) the treatment described in paragraph (2).
